text: The Name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful. This is the first Ayah of the Quran. It is a declaration of starting with Allah's name...
All praise is due to Allah, the Lord of all that exists. The seven heavens and the seven earths and whatever is in them...
Say: He is Allah, the One. This means He is the One and Only, who has no peer or assistant, no rival, no equal and none comparable to Him.
